brand_info.name: Volzhenka
brand_info.tagline: Experience the wild taste of caviar.
brand_info.positioning: A premium caviar maison positioned around heritage, savoir-faire, purity of origin, and sustainable sturgeon farming, sold through a direct-to-consumer luxury retail experience.
brand_info.vision: To preserve and share an authentic caviar heritage through responsible practices and uncompromising quality.
brand_info.mission: Produce and curate artisan caviar with minimal interference methods and sustainability-led farming, delivering a refined caviar experience from source to table.
brand_info.origin_story: Volzhenka traces its roots to Astrakhan on the banks of the Volga River, a historic crossroads linked to the Caspian Sea. Built on a family fishery heritage cultivated for over half a century, the maison extended into Europe in 2007 and established EU production in Greece, keeping standards aligned with its origin.

brand_values.brand_promise: Deliver artisan caviar defined by authentic taste, purity, and responsible production.
differentiators: Heritage rooted in Astrakhan and the Volga-Caspian caviar culture.
EU flagship farm in Drama, Greece with spring-fed water fields and controlled conditions.
Sustainability and conservation positioning, including sturgeon preservation efforts.
Luxury retail execution combining product ritual, gifting, and curated accessories.
non_negotiables: Maintain authenticity of taste and origin-led storytelling.
Preserve sturgeon welfare and sustainability principles.
Keep product and service execution premium, precise, and discreet.
Avoid mass-market cues that dilute maison positioning.

psychographics.lifestyle: Gourmet consumers, hosts, and gift buyers seeking rare, premium food experiences and ritual-driven occasions.
psychographics.behavior: Purchases for celebrations, gifting, and fine dining moments; expects premium packaging, express delivery, and concierge-style service.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Maison language blending heritage and craft with calm confidence, expressing provenance, ritual, and sustainability without exaggeration.
avoid: Overly technical jargon without sensory payoff
tone_dos: Maintain precision in product descriptors and service promises

logo.usage_rules: Use with high contrast and generous clear space; avoid effects, gradients, or distortion.
logo.lockup_behavior: Wordmark centered in premium layouts; minimal co-branding; product-first hierarchy.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the first letter in the wordmark.

color_system.color_usage_rules: High-contrast black and white for maison clarity with restrained gold accents for premium cues; backgrounds remain clean and minimal.

typography.primary_font: Refined modern serif or high-end sans-serif

layout_principles.grid_system: Luxury editorial grid with generous margins
layout_principles.cta_placement: Discrete, lower third or end of section
layout_principles.alignment: Centered, calm compositions with premium restraint

preferred_photographers: Gastronomy photographers specializing in luxury food
Documentary-style craft photographers for farms and savoir-faire
style.camera_feel: High-end still life and lifestyle gastronomy with controlled light, elevated materials, and clear product textures.
style.pose_guidelines: Hands and moments of opening, serving, and sharing; minimal staged posing; focus on ritual authenticity.
style.casting_attitude: Discreet, elegant presence; emphasis on hands, hosting, and intimate social moments.

technical.lighting: Soft, shaped light with controlled specular highlights on jars and pearls.
technical.contrast: Medium with clean blacks and crisp whites.
technical.depth_of_field: Selective focus emphasizing caviar pearls and jar details.
technical.color_grading: Neutral with warm premium accents; natural food color fidelity.

model_casting.diversity: Broad with a discreet, premium presence

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Jar, label, and caviar pearl texture clarity prioritized.
product_presentation.styling_approach: Minimal, premium materials such as mother-of-pearl, stone, linen, and refined tableware.

motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts, gentle dissolves, premium macro reveals.

visual_dos: Use premium restraint with high negative space
Show ritual moments: opening, serving, sharing
Keep product texture and label legibility pristine
visual_donts: Discount banners and loud promotional overlays
copy_dos: Describe taste through provenance and craft
Be precise about sustainability actions and methods

must_remain: Origin roots in Astrakhan and Volga heritage

interactive_elements: Concierge-style guidance on serving and storage

digital.tone_adjustment: Editorial maison voice with clear commerce utilities

platform_behavior.Instagram: Still life, ritual moments, gifting, brand heritage
platform_behavior.Website: Story, sustainability, product education, delivery and preservation guidance
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Occasion-led drops, limited selections, tasting invitations

print.paper: Premium uncoated or lightly textured stock
print.cover_rules: Minimal typography with strong still life hero image and restrained logo placement

logo_misuse_examples: Crowding the wordmark with other marks
Applying decorative effects to the logo
Placing the logo on low-contrast backgrounds
